suite.name: Script

test.name: User must sign in and select some elements

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Button
kw.doc: Verifies button ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.arg: css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div:nth-child(2) > label:nth-child(3) > input[type=checkbox]
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Selecting checkbox 'css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div:nth-child(2) > label:nth-child(3) > input[type=checkbox]'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div:nth-child(3) > label:nth-child(4) > input[type=radio]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div:nth-child(3) > label:nth-child(4) > input[type=radio]'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div.colors > select
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=body > div > div.uui-main-container.page-inside > main > div.main-content > div > div.colors > select'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(4)
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(4)' contains text 'Water: condition changed to true'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(3)
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(3)' contains text 'Wind: condition changed to true'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(2)
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'css=#mCSB_2_container > section:nth-child(1) > div.info-panel-body.info-panel-body-log > div > ul > li:nth-child(2)' contains text 'metal: value changed to Selen'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
